entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:21 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -38.0°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 36.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 36. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 38 with temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 38 with temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. Wind chill minus 53 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
